page.title: 14Leisure Information.
page.content: One Parish magazine is printed to give monthly local information. The 'local' paper is printed in Peterbor- rough and distributed from sudbury. A local person Rafi Fernandez has written various articles for national magazines and has had a book published an Malaysian Cookery. BBC film crews have been filming a T.V. Drama series an antique dealers at Belchamp Hall. There are a number of clubs based on Belchamp Otten andf Belchamp Walter. The Evergreen Club and W.I. are based on Belchamp St Pauls,and people travel to sudbury for Drama & Choral Clubs and Halstead for Young Farmers. The village hall in Belchamp Walter is used to serve teas to elderly people who come by coach, look round the village and have a home made tea.
